conversation.Name: Fiona
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Can you please tell us why the train is delayed?

conversation.Name: Male Conductor
conversation.Text: I apologize for the inconvenience, there seems to be a signal failure up ahead causing the delay.

conversation.Name: Lily
conversation.Text: How long do you think it will take to resolve the issue?

conversation.Name: Male Conductor
conversation.Text: We're working on it, but it might take another 30 minutes or so.

conversation.Name: Fiona
conversation.Text: Thank you for letting us know. We appreciate your updates.
